LanguageData.AteFungusAsIngredient_Despised.stages.at: That whole meal smelled like a dead rat left in a stagnant pool.
LanguageData.AteFungusAsIngredient_Preferred.stages.a: I ate a meal with fungus. Is there any dish it doesn't complement?
LanguageData.AteFungus_Despised.stages.ate_fungus_raw: That fungus smelled like damp rags and tasted no better.
LanguageData.AteFungus_Preferred.stages.ate_fungus.de: I ate some fungus and it was just what I like!
LanguageData.AteNonFungusMealWithPlants_Despised.stag: I ate a meal with a plant of the light. I wish it were a fungus.
LanguageData.AteNonFungusPlant_Despised.stages.ate_no: I had to eat a non-fungus plant food I despise. I much prefer fungus.
